explains: n. 传统主义者；因循守旧者
adj. 传统主义者的（等于 traditionalistic）

sentences.en: Her opposition to abortion and feminism marks her as a convinced traditionalist.
sentences.cn: 她对堕胎和女权主义的反对表明她是一个坚定的传统主义者。

sentences.en: You're a traditionalist through and through.
sentences.cn: 你是一个彻头彻尾的传统主义者。

sentences.en: Mary Bird, 65, of San Leandro, Calif., is another traditionalist, if a reluctant one.
sentences.cn: 住在加州圣莱安德罗，65岁的Mary Bird是另一个传统派，虽然她不愿意。
